categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Quickdraw" was the nickname of a human female TIE fighter pilot in the First Order. She served as a Special Forces pilot who flew one of the specialized TIE/sf space superiority fighters. Quickdraw had light skin and dirty blonde hair. She was equipped with the First Order pilot uniform and was described as a defiant duelist. At one point, Quickdraw flew in a debris field and fired her starfighter's laser cannons.
